page.title: 16Carlisle Public Baths
page.content: The Baths are in James Street, though the larger secondary schools also have swimming pools. The Family Pool is 0.9 metres deep at the shallow end and 1.6 at the deep end; the adjacent "baby" pool is 0.75m deep. On the other side of the building the "big" pool's depths are 0.9m and 2.0m. The Baths are open daily from 9.00am till 9.00pm except Thursday and Saturday (9-5) and Sunday (10-12). The equivalent of three-quarters of Carlisle's population swim here each year. As you pay (60p adults, 30p children and OAPs) you are given a coloured band. When a light of that colour flashes after about an hour you must leave the water.Chlorine is added each morning to kill germs. There are five life-guards on duty. A cafeteria next to the spectator area serves snacks.
